achievements: I improved the execution of data synchronization of our APIs with those of MMC, lowering the time from approximately 40 minutes to 6 minutes.
Improvement in code quality by adding tests and good practices with SOLID principles.
Design and implement the centralized configuration pattern for all platform microservices.

Implemented a continuous integration system using Gitlab CI to ensure fast and reliable delivery of updated code, improving the efficiency of the development team and reducing errors in the final product delivery.
